Manuel Ernesto ⚡️
My papers

Double White Dwarf Binaries in SDSS-V DR19 : The discovery of a rare DA+DQ white dwarf binary with 31 hour orbital period

We discover a rare DA+DQ DWD binary with 31 hour orbital period, which is only fourth such system know. Read the paper here!

Discovery of a Proto–White Dwarf with a Massive Unseen Companion

We discovered a binary with a low-mass WD orbiting an extremely massive companion (likely a near-chandrasekhar mass WD) with a 36 hour orbital period. Read the paper here!

Reconciling hints on axion-like-particles from high-energy gamma rays with stellar bounds

Read the paper here!

Cosmological implications of electromagnetically interacting dark matter: milli-charged particles and atoms with singly and doubly charged dark matter

Read the paper here!

SDSS-V DR19 data release paper

A Large Catalog of DA White Dwarf Characteristics Using SDSS and Gaia Observations

A Large Catalog of DA White Dwarf Characteristics Using SDSS and Gaia Observations

ASASSN-24fw: Candidate circumplanetary disk occultation of a main-sequence star

Discovery of a 4 magnitude (10 times lower flux!) in a star that otherwise looked normal. We believe this is caused due obscuration by a thick dusty disk around a planet that orbits the star.

Resolution-Corrected White Dwarf Gravitational Redshifts Validate SDSS-V Wavelength Calibration and Enable Accurate Mass-Radius Tests

Sloan Digital Sky Survey-V: Pioneering Panoptic Spectroscopy

Cataclysmic variables from Sloan Digital Sky Survey - V (2020-2023) identified using machine learning

Detection of the Temperature Dependence of the White Dwarf Mass–Radius Relation with Gravitational Redshifts
